title: Heera & Manikyam Jhumka: A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: featuring exquisite Polki Diamonds (uncut diamonds) and a vibrant
teardrop-shaped Ruby (Manikyam). Impeccable Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lustrous
features: Classic South Indian Jhumka design, with a floral arrangement top featuring Polki diamonds and a ruby accentuating the center. The main jhumka showcases a larger pear-shaped ruby bordered by a halo of Polki diamonds. Expertly crafted setting maximizes the brilliance of each gemstone. The overall design reflects a timeless elegance and showcases masterful craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold with striking contrasts from the vibrant red Ruby and sparkling White/Off-White of the Polki Diamonds.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranti
and special family gatherings. Adds a touch of traditional glamour to any formal event.
description: A true heirloom piece crafted with the highest quality materials and traditional techniques. The combination of Polki diamonds and a natural Ruby carries cultural significance and symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. The exquisite craftsmanship ensures durability and a timeless appeal. This Jhumka is a statement piece that exudes grace and sophistication.
